name: Acrodog
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 34 in under 48 hours: entry page here

Tilt the stage to help your stunt dog "Lil Houndini" stay in the spotlight and wow the audience! The audience may get irritated if Houndini stays in the dark for too long. Also, there are giant beach balls.

Z and M keys tilt the stage, making Lil Houndini run left and right or jump.

"Houndini" name credit goes to Lindsey "Dank" Poad
